response.original_title: To Be a Broken Black Lover
response.overview: After a vulnerable date with a kind-hearted woman, a guarded Black man struggling with emotional scars finds himself at a crossroads. As the two reconnect in a quiet park, unspoken truths surface, leading to an unexpected revelation.
response.tagline: Some hearts dont break, they bleed quietly.
response.title: To Be a Broken Black Lover
